text: Mubayahudi balimwo bakalukhaninjia amakhuwa okhukarusia abundu wako, ne baboolanga mbu; khuwulile mana khukhayile, ne wulila obula rechelesia. Ne baboolanga mbu: “Raai’na” khulwo khukalukhania tsinimi tsiabu khobanyeke idini. Ne baboolanga mbu; khuwulile mana nikhufuchilila, ne uwulile mana ukhuhengekhwo, bwakhabele obulayi khubo nende abwene muno. Halali Nyasaye yabatsuba khubukhayi bwabu, kho shibasuubilanga tawe halali batitisa mubo
